instructions: Add milk and Greek yogurt to a blender.
Add banana, strawberries, and blueberries to the blender.
Add honey or maple syrup if you want extra sweetness.
Add chia seeds and vanilla extract.
Add ice cubes if needed and blend again for a thicker shake.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
nutritional_benefits: Good source of protein from Greek yogurt.
Contains potassium and fiber from banana.
Chia seeds add omega-3 fatty acids and fiber.
